abstract: Three-year-old girl thrown into pond in Durham, NC, by her father Alan Lassiter dies; Lassiter is held on three counts of attempted murder; girl's two siblings, who were also thrown into pond, survive.
lead_paragraph: A 3-year-old girl who was thrown into a pond at an apartment complex by her father late Sunday died on Wednesday, the police in Durham, N.C., said.

headline.main: North Carolina: 3-year-old Thrown Into Pond Dies
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: 3-year-old Thrown Into Pond Dies

snippet: A 3-year-old girl who was thrown into a pond at an apartment complex by her father late Sunday died on Wednesday, the police in Durham, N.C., said.
